name: Stepping Stone
short_description: A remote control which enables you to communicate with your computers shell, and other programs and services. Data is currently sent via the MSN Messenger network. There is an emphasis on ease of use for a remote user connecting from a cell phone.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: Artistic License
